resources.string: Are you sure you want to delete all recipes from favorites?
Recipe is already saved to favorites
Easily search for delicious recipes using keywords. Browse through a variety of recipes, view details, and save your favorites ones for quick access using My favorites button
Please enter a keyword for search

Button to search for a recipe
Would you like to save this song to your favorites list?
Are you sure you want to delete this song?

"Search:
" "1. Enter an artist name then hit search.
" "2. Select an artist to display their albums.
" "3. Select an album for more details.
" "4. Click on a song to add to favorite list.

" "Access favorites list:
" "1. Click on the icon in the top right corner.
" "2. A list of your favorite songs will be displayed.
" "3. Click on the song from the list for more details.

" "Delete from Favorites:
" "1. Access favorite list.
" "2. Click delete to remove a song from favorites."
